original_title: Wir könnten, wir sollten, wir hätten doch...
overview: Sunday night in snowy Germany. On television, the usual news about refugee disasters on the coast of Italy, in the kitchen Sushi is being stacked on a plate. A couple tries to spend a cozy evening, but suddenly a stranger, who is freezing outside, is ringing the doorbell. This sparks a quarrel about what they could do, should do, or have to do...
title: We Could Have, We Should Have, We Didn't...
